name: The Brave Little Abacus
description: '''The Brave Little Abacus''' (or simply '''Brave Little Abacus''') was an American [[emo]] band formed in [[Sandown, New Hampshire]], in 2007. The band consisted of vocalist, guitarist, and drummer Adam Demirjian, bassist Andrew Ryan, and keyboardist Zach Kelly-Onett. They were joined by Nick Morrone on drums in 2011.
